title: Katie Price 'secretly messaging famous married men' claims ex Charles Drury
text:

Katie Price reportedly sends flirty sexts to famous married men - despite being in a relationship.

The mother-of-five's naughty messaging has been unveiled by 22-year-old Charles Drury - who Katie had a brief relationship with this summer - before rekindling her romance with personal trainer Kris Boyson.

The builder claims that he became aware of the busty star exchanging messages with other men during their fling and shared he can't understand why Kris would take her back.

"When she was with me she was definitely talking to people and arranging to meet up with them, I used to see the messages pop up," the builder told The Sun.

He added: "There are a few famous people who are married."

Charles also told how he would "never take someone back who has cheated" or "done things behind his back," in reference to Kris and Katie reuniting.

He then admitted that the personal trainer is "his own man" and if he wants to tie the knot with Katie that is "up to him".

Since the end of their relationship, builder Charles has made a string of explosive statements about his and Katie's brief courtship.

Charles claims that on the first night they met, they binged on drugs and drink before sleeping together hours later.

(Image: charlesdrury1/Instagram)

(Image: Youtube)

He also believes she cheated on him during their fling, but she would never admit to it.

Their relationship came to an end when Charles saw pictures of her leaving Kris' house.

Katie previously admitted to taking cocaine weekly for six months as she struggled to cope with her mum's terminal illness and ex husband Kieran's cheating.

(Image: Brett D. Cove / Splash News)

(Image: Instagram)

She had checked into rehab and was treated for trauma and depression.

A spokesperson for Katie Price said: "There is no truth in the allegation that she is taking drugs every day and has made significant steps to being drug free - there have been lapses in the past but they are just that, not a regular event. Katie is still in recovery and making progress."

Mirror Online have contacted a representative for Katie for comment.
description: Charles Drury, who enjoyed a brief fling with the former glamour model, has lifted the lid on her secret racy texts to married men
